history.proof: qauto unfold: liste_rec_length_def inv: pl_tl_length, liste_reconnait.

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl H H0.
assert (rec_list_terms d ls (tcons hd tl) 0 = true \/ rec_term d a hd 0 = true /\ rec_list_terms d la tl 0 = true).
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a : ad la, ls : prec_list hd : term tl : term_list H : liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) H0 : liste_rec_length_def d ls (tcons hd tl) Unable to unify "liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl)" with "rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) 1 = true".

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl H H0.

original: intros d a la ls hd tl H H0. assert (rec_list_terms d ls (tcons hd tl) 0 = true \/ rec_term d a hd 0 = true /\ rec_list_terms d la tl 0 = true). - apply invar_2_1 with (n := 0). apply H. - apply invar_2_2 with (n := 0) in H1. unfold liste_rec_length_def. intros n Hl Hp. destruct (Hl n H H0) as [Hl1 Hl2]. rewrite <- Hl2 in *. destruct H1 as [H2 | [H3 H4]]. + apply pl_tl_propag with (n := n). * apply Hl1. * apply H4 in Hp. apply Hp. + unfold rec_list_terms in *. apply liste_rec_length_1 with (a := a) (la := la) (ls := ls) (hd := hd) (tl := tl). apply semantic_equiv_1_4_0; eauto.
